About AI Applications
AI Applications
    ✔: Newly added
    *: Updated
    Agriculture
    • *Defense wild animals for crop
    • Fruit and Vegetable Plant Disease Check
    • *Ranch Livestock Management
    Smart Building
    • *Elevator passengers Counting
    • *Conference Room Usage Monitor
    • *Lighting Control
    • *Security Area Intrusion Detection
    • Wear management at construction sites
    • Touchless Controller for elevator
    • Employee ID check for Restricted Area
    Smart City
    • *Congestion Detection in Railway Station
    • *Prohibited Area Management
    • Distracted driving detection
    • *Duration monitoring for surveillance camera
    • Parking Spot Reservation
    • Illegal Parking Check
    • Passport check support
    • *Bus passenger counting
    • *Backtravel Detection
    • Violence Activity Check in Surveillance Camera
    • *Bird Damage Prevention
    • *Blind Spot Monitor
    • Preceding Vehicle Movement Alert
    • *Emergency Vehicles Detector
    • Illegal Bicycle Approach Detection
    • Bicycle Rental Stock Management
    • Illegal Bicycle Parking Monitor Support
    • Infrastructure Defect Prevention
    • Crime Prevention Support for School
    Healthcare
    • Physical Condition Monitor
    Smart Home
    • *Air Conditioner Control
    • Smart TV
    • *Pet Detection in Kitchen and Child's Room
    • Touchless Controller for Kitchen Appliance
    • Food Package Expiry Date Check
    Industrial
    • *Work Area Personnel Management
    • *Access Control
    • Helmet and safety vest wearing monitor
    • Touchless Controller for Industrial machine
    • Driver Monitoring System
    • Species check support in Fish Factory
    • Defect Inspection Support
    • Aquaculture Industrial Support
    Retail
    • *Congestion Detection
    • Smart POS
    • Marketing Interest Analysis
    • *Staying and flow line monitoring
    • *Exhibition Participants Monitoring
    • Store Crime Prevention

Version History


e2 studio for RZ/V2H - AI Navigator Quick Start Guide

2024.4.25
  • e2 studio for RZ/V2H - AI Navigator Quick Start Guide is released.
    • Users can start AI Applications development with e2 studio (GUI tool).

Tutorial Video - RZ/V2H Getting Started v3.00

2024.4.11
  • Tutorial Video - RZ/V2H Getting Started v3.00 is released.
    • Users can learn the content of Getting Started in the video.
    • Based on RZ/V2H AI SDK v3.00.

AI Applications & RZ/V2H AI SDK v3.00

2024.2.29
  • AI Applications v3.00 is released.
    • Added RZ/V2H Evaluation Board Kit support for 21 applications.
  • RZ/V2H AI SDK v3.00 is released.

e2 studio for RZ/V2L - AI Navigator Quick Start Guide

2024.2.29
  • e2 studio for RZ/V2L - AI Navigator Quick Start Guide is released.
    • Users can start AI Applications development with e2 studio (GUI tool).

e2 studio for RZ/V2L and RZ/V AI Transfer Learning Tool v2.10

2024.1.26
  • e2 studio for RZ/V2L is released.
    • Users can develop AI Applications using e2 studio (GUI tool).
    • Supported 22 AI Applications.
  • RZ/V AI Transfer Learning Tool v2.10 is released.
    • Users can re-train the AI model of AI Applications v2.10 using Transfer Learning Tool.
    • Supported 16 AI Applications.

Tutorial Video - Getting Started v2.10

2023.12.04
  • Tutorial Video - Getting Started v2.10 is released.
    • Users can learn the content of Getting Started in the video.
      It contains the boot demonstration using eSD bootloader.
    • Based on RZ/V2L AI SDK v2.10.

AI Applications Demo v2.10

2023.11.30
  • AI Applications Demo v2.10 is released.
    • Supported RZ/V2L AI SDK v2.10.
      Filesize is decreased to around 3.4GB since the OSS package is moved to AI SDK Source Code.
    • Added 13 AI Applications.

AI Applications & AI SDK v2.10

2023.11.10
  • AI Applications v2.10 is released.
    • Added 13 Applications.
  • RZ/V2L AI SDK v2.10 is released.
    • AI SDK Source Code is provided as an additional zip file.
      Users can customize Linux environment.
    • AI SDK filesize is decreased to 2.8GB, which is easier to download.

AI Applications Demo v2.00

2023.9.15
  • AI Applications Demo v2.00 is released.
    • Supported RZ/V2L AI SDK v2.00.
      Operation time limit due to Graphics Library Evaluation Version/Video Codec Library Evaluation Version is extended from 3 hours to approximately 10 hours.
    • Changed to eSD Bootloader, which does not require Windows PC to write bootloader.
    • Added 17 AI Applications.

AI Applications & AI SDK v2.00

2023.8.31
  • AI Applications v2.00 is released.
    • Added 15 Applications.
    • Improved AI accuracy for 8 Applications.
  • RZ/V2L AI SDK v2.00 is released.
    • Operation time limit due to Graphics Library Evaluation Version/Video Codec Library Evaluation Version is extended from 3 hours to 10 hours.
    • Added support for eSD Bootloader, which does not require Windows PC to write bootloader. (Recommended boot mode)

Tutorial Video - Getting Started v1.00

2023.8.08
  • Tutorial Video - Getting Started v1.00 is released.
    • Users can learn the content of Getting Started in the video.

AI Applications Demo v1.00

2023.6.30
  • AI Applications Demo v1.00 is released.
    • Users can use AI Applications without constructing the AI SDK environment.

AI Applications & AI SDK v1.00

2023.4.23
  • AI Applications v1.00 is released.
  • RZ/V2L AI SDK v1.00 is released.
